title: Chemical Engineering Operator Training: XR-Based Experiential Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational chemical engineering concepts and general understanding of industrial settings
context.additional_context: Chemistry process simulation learning environment utilizing smartphone-based extended reality (XR) content.

learning_goals: Learners can manipulate 3D models of chemical process equipment in XR environments while explaining key components and functions
Learners can respond to abnormal situations in chemical processes according to safety protocols through virtual scenario-based training
Learners improve communication skills by sharing real-time problem-solving strategies with peer learners through XR-based collaborative activities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
